title: Prifddinas Agility Course

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Prifddinas Agility Course is an agility course available to players with 75 Agility. It requires completion of the Song of the Elves quest. It can be started by climbing the ladder just outside of the north-western bank in Prifddinas.

content:
Prifddinas Agility Course
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationPrifddinas
Map
Advanced data
Typeagility course

The Prifddinas Agility Course is an agility course available to players with 75 Agility. It requires completion of the Song of the Elves quest. It can be started by climbing the ladder just outside of the north-western bank in Prifddinas.

The portal that occasionally appears.

This agility course is unique to other courses, in that portals which act as shortcuts appear at various points throughout running the course. There are a total of 6 possible unique portal locations, and only one will appear per lap. Using these shortcuts, which are unique to each player, slightly increases the experience gained. Each lap duration is on average 74 seconds long, with the fastest completion time being 58 seconds. The portal shortcuts can bring this duration down by around 5-10 seconds, depending on the location in which the portal spawns. Use of these gives 82 experience and, on average, adds an additional 55.4 experience per lap. Players can speak to Ystwyth to find out statistics about the course, including the total number of laps the player has completed as well as their fastest lap completion time.

Players can expect to find roughly 15 crystal shards per hour when training (the probability is 1/3 per portal). These shards will automatically appear in the player's inventory. Marks of grace cannot be obtained on this course.

Players can expect an experience rate of approximately 65,000 experience per hour at level 90 Agility with the usage of portal shortcuts.

Players stop failing this course at level 91 Agility.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
1 August 2019
(update | poll)

The Agility Course XP rates have been increased from 56k xp/hr at level 90 when not using shortcuts and 62k xp/hr when using shortcuts to 60k and 66k, respectively.

[[File:Prifddinas Agility Course portal.png|thumb|right|The [[Portal (Prifddinas Agility Course)|portal]] that occasionally appears.]] This agility course is unique to other courses, in that [[Portal (Prifddinas Agility Course)|portals]] which act as shortcuts appear at various points throughout running the course. There are a total of 6 possible unique portal locations, and only one will appear per lap. Using these shortcuts, which are unique to each player, slightly increases the experience gained. Each lap duration is on average 74 seconds long, with the fastest completion time being 58 seconds. The portal shortcuts can bring this duration down by around 5-10 seconds, depending on the location in which the portal spawns. Use of these gives 82 experience and, on average, adds an additional 55.4 experience per lap. Players can speak to [[Ystwyth]] to find out statistics about the course, including the total number of laps the player has completed as well as their fastest lap completion time. Players can expect to find roughly 15 [[crystal shard]]s per hour when training (the probability is 1/3 per portal). These shards will automatically appear in the player's inventory. [[Mark of grace|Marks of grace]] cannot be obtained on this course. Players can expect an experience rate of approximately 65,000 experience per hour at level 90 Agility with the usage of portal shortcuts.
